013package org.apache.juneau.microservice.jetty;
014
015import java.io.*;
016
017import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
018import org.eclipse.jetty.server.*;
019import org.eclipse.jetty.util.resource.*;
020import org.eclipse.jetty.xml.*;
021
022/**
023 * Basic implementation of a Jetty server factory.
024 *
025 * <ul class='seealso'>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-microservice-jetty">juneau-microservice-jetty</a>
027 * </ul>
028 */
029public class BasicJettyServerFactory implements JettyServerFactory {
030
031   @Override
032   public Server create(String jettyXml) throws Exception {
033      if (jettyXml == null)
034         throw new RuntimeException("jetty.xml file location was not specified in the configuration file (Jetty/config) or manifest file (Jetty-Config) or found on the file system or classpath.");
035      File f = FileUtils.createTempFile("jetty.xml");
036      try (Reader r = new StringReader(jettyXml); Writer w = new FileWriter(f)) {
037         IOUtils.pipe(r, w);
038         w.flush();
039      }
040      XmlConfiguration xmlConfiguration = new XmlConfiguration(Resource.newResource(f));
041      return (Server)xmlConfiguration.configure();
042   }
043}
